page.title: 06MY DADDY'S WORK
page.content:
My Daddy has been in Northumbria Police Force seventeen years. He has passed the test to drive Panda cars. He has been trained in the use of computers,teleprinters and radio equipment. When he was in the Control Room he had to send policemen to incidents in the city and had to send policemen, ambulances and fire engines to the airport if an aeroplane was having trouble landing. {Gordon Eglinton Age 9}
My Daddy is a policeman. He works in Newcastle. He has a special job and does not wear a uniform. He always works with a partner,sometimes a man, sometimes a woman. I do not see him at night very often because he comes home at two o'clock in the morning. {Hazel Eglinton Age 7}
